project.heading: Redesign of Surbiton Tyre and Wheel Website
project.brief:
Objective:

To redesign the Surbiton Tyre and Wheel website, creating a modern, user-friendly, and SEO-optimized online presence. The project will enhance content organization, performance, and mobile responsiveness.

Scope of Work:

  1. Pages to be Built:
    • Main Pages: Home, Wheels > Brand page, Wheels > Wheel Refurbishment, Tyres > Brand page
    • Additional Pages: Batteries, Mobile Fitting, Accessories, TPMS, Fleet, Gallery, About
  2. Design and Content:
    • Develop a brand-new, modern design for the entire website.
    • Re-organize existing content to improve usability and SEO.
    • Implement redirects for all changed page addresses to maintain SEO integrity.
    • Enhance content as part of the restructuring process to boost SEO where appropriate.
  3. Navigation and Homepage:
    • Restructure the main navigation to align with the new website structure.
    • Design a new homepage featuring an image slider, heading, content, and links to promote other pages and products.
  4. Content Management System (CMS):
    • Set up a new CMS to replace the current WordPress system, reducing the need for extensive maintenance and enhancing security.
    • Ensure the new CMS allows for easy editing and creation of pages, providing flexibility without needing developer assistance.
  5. Performance and Usability:
    • Utilize modern coding techniques to improve code quality, accessibility, and usability (UX).
    • Enhance the mobile website experience using advanced responsive design methods.
    • Ensure the new website is error-free, loads quickly, and is highly responsive on both mobile and larger screen devices.
  6. SEO and Accessibility:
    • Implement SEO best practices, including the addition of meta tags for better search engine information.
    • Focus on improving website accessibility and user experience through refined coding practices.

Deliverables:

  • A redesigned, modern website with the specified pages.
  • Improved content organization and SEO optimization.
  • Restructured main navigation and enhanced homepage.
  • Enhanced mobile and desktop performance and usability.
  • Full editing capabilities for all pages and easy creation of new pages.

This project aims to transform the Surbiton Tyre and Wheel website into a high-performing, user-friendly platform with improved SEO and a seamless mobile experience.
